Description: Green glazed composition shabti of Wedjahormehnet born of Astirdis with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard, incised parallel hands holding a hoe, an adze and the string of the seed-basket which hangs over the shoulder, the front of the body is inscribed with a column of incised hieroglyphs running from the chest to the ankle; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the feet.
